thread.title: Apple Seeds iOS 10.3.2 Public Beta 1 to Public Testers
thread.title_full: Apple Seeds iOS 10.3.2 Public Beta 1 to Public Testers

author: Evan Selleck
title: Apple Seeds iOS 10.3.2 Public Beta 1 to Public Testers
text:
Apple Seeds iOS 10.3.2 Public Beta 1 to Public Testers Posted by Evan Selleck on Mar 29, 2017 | No Comments Pin 1 Shares 108 
Earlier this week, Apple not only launched iOS 10.3 to the public, but it also started seeding the first developer betas for iOS 10.3.2 as well. 
And now the company is seeding the first public beta of iOS 10.3.2. This new software is the same as the developer beta that was seeded earlier this week, which means it’s a minor software update that’s meant to address any new behind-the-scenes issues that were discovered since the public release of iOS 10.3, as well as improve overall performance. 
If you are not part of the public beta program yet, you can learn more right here . For those already signed up, and which have the necessary configuration profile on their iOS device, the new beta can be installed as an over-the-air update. 
If anything noteworthy is discovered in the public beta, we’ll update this post accordingly. Like this post? Share it!
